text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse You, President Trump, must be day dreaming. You failed to stand up to COVID-19 with the American might at your disposal,at the earliest possible time. Jobs which USA had created in the last 20 years were wiped out by COVID-19. Stand up like a gentleman and accept the blame.
